Html:
Using v2.2.2, running the upgrade list, it's giving me items that I've marked available and also all of the items that I have equipped, and also items that are clearly inferior to what I have equipped.

Edit: this only happens when I have a staff equipped, as opposed to mainhand + offhand. When I unchecked my staff as available, it gave me a normal upgrade list with stuff I didn't have yet. Along with this issue, I've come to the conclusion that staves right now are completely borked in optimizer/upgrade lists.
Any time you see an item in an upgrade list that you have available, that means you aren't optimized for what you already have available.
